InGame.InGame_Area001_ExplainOnyon:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="614f5f6f2a2e4776a192544419076af0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Come in,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] come in...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Looks like
you made it there in one piece![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="614f5f6f2a2e4776a192544419076af0" Scale="1"/]Hang onâ€”I'll have the captain explain how
today's rescue operation will work.
InGame.InGame_Area001_ExplainOnyon_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="73af965164c5451bb4ff23b98e34d597" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]See the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]clock[System:Color name="Default"] at the top-left corner of
your screen?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="73af965164c5451bb4ff23b98e34d597" Scale="1"/]It's set up so that the hand will reach
the right-most edge at the area's local
sunset time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="73af965164c5451bb4ff23b98e34d597" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Search for our missing Rescue Officers
during the day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but hustle back to the
Rescue Command Post before dark.
InGame.InGame_Area001_ExplainOnyon_Choice_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="72772fe51110428cb46bedd8ff62122c" Scale="1"/]Copy that!

InGame.InGame_Area001_ExplainOnyon_Branch_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="45190ff4c69948a38c135b952120e2bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]We're counting on you!
InGame.InGame_Area001_ExplainOnyon_Choice_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c1a612f0fad247e6bd3d82bf46f31820" Scale="1"/]I'm on the job!
InGame.InGame_Area001_ExplainOnyon_Reaction02: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6f38ca0c028341328f6ff2e5447a4593" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Yes" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="USen"/]
InGame.InGame_Area001_ExplainOnyon_Branch_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="85aa8632523e4cffb8b879f8d75a1ed0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Try to remember that you're supposed to
respond with "copy that"![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Anyway,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] get
out there and make us proud.
InGame.InGame_Area001_ExplainOnyon_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="41f158e15d3a40d996d8eb6a9f6d73bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you probably noticed that the Onion
accompanied the S.S. Beagle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="41f158e15d3a40d996d8eb6a9f6d73bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]According to the Voyage Log,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Onion
also serves as a form of transportation
for the Pikmin.
InGame.InGame_Area001_ExplainOnyon_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="deb14229139b4d4ab3cc3ccd22774c46" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]We've got a lot to do and can take all the
help we can get.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think you could put
those Pikmin to good use.
InGame.InGame_HappySkill_Smell_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1ec9e8801e8244ceafc219d6acd574c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Come in, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1ec9e8801e8244ceafc219d6acd574c7" Scale="1"/]I forgot an important detail.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That is, you're
going to need [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s help when it comes
to searching for the Rescue Officers.
InGame.InGame_HappySkill_Smell_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:BCancel enable="True"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7818121317ad406783560df534df2d5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]He has a sharp sense of smell,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so he'll
be able to locate the Rescue Officers by
tracking their scents.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7818121317ad406783560df534df2d5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Use [PictureFont:IconData key="YMenu" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/] to open Actions,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and then use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Left" scale="0.66"/]
to select a search [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Command[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7818121317ad406783560df534df2d5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]To begin with,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] command [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pick Up
a Scent[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You never know where his nose
may lead you.
InGame.InGame_HappySkill_Smell_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="aeaf89c4840f4a539c43b4fa6f7f47c1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Rescue operations are a race against time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
so put your [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Dandori[System:Color name="Default"] skills to work to find
our Rescue Officers quickly.
InGame.InGame_HappySkill_Smell__Reaction01: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="66061583ffb943b6bc36623876ff3dc8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="ThinkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="USen"/]
InGame.InGame_HappySkill_Smell_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5e32ad5f0a434c1391810af6b36fd7a8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="ThinkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]You look a little confused...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Have you
never heard the term "Dandori" before,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]? [etc:Wait frame="15"/]How to explain...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5e32ad5f0a434c1391810af6b36fd7a8" Scale="1"/]Dandori is the art of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]organizing your tasks
strategically and working with maximum
efficiency to execute your plans quickly[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5e32ad5f0a434c1391810af6b36fd7a8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Its practice has fallen by the wayside in
recent years,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it's still a core tenet of
the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so take it to heart.
InGame.InGame_HappySkill_Smell_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f6864a9ff14643699e4eb173d76b9e02" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/]Embracing the art of Dandori is essential
to our work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And you'll need it out there
while searching for our Rescue Officers![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f6864a9ff14643699e4eb173d76b9e02" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]To get things started,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] open [PictureFont:IconData key="YMenu" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/]Actions
and Command [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to sniff out our
missing comrades!
InGame.InGame_DiscoveryBase001_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2ff5b908155449d9a0da24518eb01ad1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Huh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] another circle of stones.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We keep

the S.S. Beagle [System:Color name="Default"]here.
InGame.InGame_DiscoveryBase001_01_Yoko:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c924784bfb69403da41c567f39e1ebe2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Huh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] another circle of stones.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We keep

locations. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]How interesting.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c924784bfb69403da41c567f39e1ebe2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Maybe Captain Olimar left them behind for

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="95915574606e40698ca2cbdd77323220" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Any Pikmin on standby near the landing

and they can regroup here[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="95915574606e40698ca2cbdd77323220" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Be sure to move your base wisely.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's

good Dandori instincts.
InGame.InGame_DiscoveryBase002_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5ee25e3293d14fb7ab425aae9f4aed5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Huh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] another circle of stones.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We keep

locations. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]How interesting.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5ee25e3293d14fb7ab425aae9f4aed5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Maybe [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] left them behind for

InGame.InGame_DiscoveryBase002_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0285d09dc2b04e35b4ce0f3e3457fb93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]We should create a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]base [System:Color name="Default"]here. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Any Dandori

InGame.InGame_Area003_ChangeWaterLevel:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d2dca6efb26b4cdeb24fb6ce26631762" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Did the water justâ€”[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d2dca6efb26b4cdeb24fb6ce26631762" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]tide appears to ebb in the afternoon[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
That ought to make it a lot easier to
explore now!
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminYellow:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="86a55033b743476ea3009a5bb7f5360a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Is this a new type of Pikmin?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="86a55033b743476ea3009a5bb7f5360a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I should check to see if [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s
log says anything about them!
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminYellowNoOnyon:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="48c61b9f38104431855fb22ef33432b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Resistant to electricity?[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="8"/] How unusual.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
What in the world are they made of?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="48c61b9f38104431855fb22ef33432b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]That sounds like a potentially useful
quality though![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just be careful how you

InGame.InGame_JoinPikminBlue:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2de63d4c19a74ac5bdb3b97933f02346" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]We haven't seen Pikmin like these before.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2de63d4c19a74ac5bdb3b97933f02346" Scale="1"/]I wonder if [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] ever
encountered anything like them.
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminBlueNoOnyon:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="cd7eddecf81141ba8908c40191fc8c85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Now we can [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]carry things in the water[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cd7eddecf81141ba8908c40191fc8c85" Scale="1"/]Search the water thoroughly![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm counting
on you, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminPurple:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e9db01e0e4984b7294e28d40527b3416" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]These Pikmin certainly have some

be a relevant entry.
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminPurpleNoOnyon:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="99f8c93c56ed437fb75f1bf0612fd687" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]They're [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]10[System:Color name="Default"] times stronger than other
Pikmin?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] How could they possess so
much power?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="99f8c93c56ed437fb75f1bf0612fd687" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it sounds like we can rely on them for
some heavy lifting.
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminWhite:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a9bf702aa4044c4180eb4151ba0d6b38" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]White Pikmin this time?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a9bf702aa4044c4180eb4151ba0d6b38" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I can't wait to find out what qualities
these little guys have!
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminWhiteNoOnyon:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="80239983feb44b789ccf1abc3888a7f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]P-poison?![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="80239983feb44b789ccf1abc3888a7f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I'm sure they aren't a threat to us,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I

InGame.InGame_JoinPikminRock:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fff3ca1962d749bdba77164bf4b0b733" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Um...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could these be Pikmin too?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fff3ca1962d749bdba77164bf4b0b733" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]There's no way these were mentioned in
the Voyage Log...
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminRockNoOnyon:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4990fb4829524b46b4ce64145d3aaeb9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So they're [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]hard as rocks[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4990fb4829524b46b4ce64145d3aaeb9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Now that I really look at them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I see how
you could easily mistake this Pikmin for
a basic stone.
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminWing:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="387138b2b6b64c16b40c4b2d5ff55134" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]They can fly?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="387138b2b6b64c16b40c4b2d5ff55134" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The variety of Pikmin types never ceases
to amaze me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let me look these up.
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminWingNoOnyon:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="430d0d6af2b54c0a9ac290456c81adc5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Huzzah! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The sky is no longer out of
our reach![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="430d0d6af2b54c0a9ac290456c81adc5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]We'll get much more exploring and rescuing
done with the help of these Pikmin!
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminIce: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d2d2be8e2fec4b7587633e60eb9e3467" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Are these Pikmin too?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d2d2be8e2fec4b7587633e60eb9e3467" Scale="1"/]Let's see.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The Voyage Log says...
InGame.InGame_JoinPikminIceNoOnyon:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b01a0e82bcb2483c86d75424688b778b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Their bodies are made of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ice[System:Color name="Default"]?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b01a0e82bcb2483c86d75424688b778b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Who knew that something frozen could
move around like that.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's incredible.
InGame.InGame_DiscoverySurvivor:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="90c1c78c2940473bb4a10c336168dbb4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]We found a castaway![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="90c1c78c2940473bb4a10c336168dbb4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]Hurry and check their vitals![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="90c1c78c2940473bb4a10c336168dbb4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="PlayMusic2"/]Pulse,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] blood pressure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] temperature...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
All within normal parameters.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Looks like
their life-support system did its job.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="90c1c78c2940473bb4a10c336168dbb4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]We should transport them back to the
S.S. Beagle and verify their ID badge.
InGame.InGame_DiscoverySizai_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7f8cb00a266f4be5ab84f75c7c414d9e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That's a pretty rock,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] isn't it?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7f8cb00a266f4be5ab84f75c7c414d9e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It doesn't seem like treasure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it might

Voyage Log.
InGame.InGame_DiscoverySizai_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3b4d08ae08cb4e53883c6479e4b2fdea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I'm a fair hand with machines,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I don't
know much about materials science.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3b4d08ae08cb4e53883c6479e4b2fdea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]If we had our scientist back,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I bet he'd

something to work with after we find him.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ddf4b1166cb840718f8069649b747b85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Aha,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this must be the [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Sizai" scale="0.66"/]raw material we

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ef76339031104af0ba6d4a8611d3cf7a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Was this [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]under construction[System:Color name="Default"] at some

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="33c3aaeb9b19432caf7976464c1a6814" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Grammar:Cap/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] come in,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] over.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="33c3aaeb9b19432caf7976464c1a6814" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has never really liked getting wet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]

through any water obstacle![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="efc049de43094d8886b0ac2b83933195" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Get on [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s back with the Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
you can ride across bodies of water
to explore new areas.
InGame.InGame_StateGenseiFreeze: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="26a15bd94fce4826ad14737d43a6e6c5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]It...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it froze?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="26a15bd94fce4826ad14737d43a6e6c5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Don't just stand there.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Now's your chance!

InGame.InGame_DiscoveryTanebiStation_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7b208224a27c46f7bef3dbe7d79859db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] If you take that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]fire starter[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you

those bonfire altars and have even more
fire starters at the ready.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7b208224a27c46f7bef3dbe7d79859db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]But all that aside,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that thing looks so hot

InGame.InGame_ExplainCave_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ca9568d6c4bd462382a81ead76535052" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I wonder if there might be a Voyage Log
entry related to these coordinates.[etc:Wait frame="30"/]
Yep,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] here it is!
InGame.InGame_ExplainCave_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3639e747d2dc4b5ab16079d84903d82b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Take a look at this![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
certainly is thorough, isn't he?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3639e747d2dc4b5ab16079d84903d82b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]According to the log,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] anytime you enter a
cave,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you should take Pikmin with you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3639e747d2dc4b5ab16079d84903d82b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The S.S. Beagle can bring the Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so
you can enter the cave without stopping
by the base first.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3639e747d2dc4b5ab16079d84903d82b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The Pikmin that remain on the surface
can't just be left out here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so let's [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]return
them to the Onion [System:Color name="Default"]for the time being.
InGame.InGame_CollectPodKira_Area002:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4a37dfc12dec474b8c78598331f56036" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You did it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Really great job, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
and [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4a37dfc12dec474b8c78598331f56036" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]With all the energy you've collected,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we
can continue our restoration of the
S.S. Shepherd's radar!
InGame.InGame_CollectPodKira_Area003:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0ca8363e96714bca954634c0727a32b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Fantastic![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We accomplished our goal![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0ca8363e96714bca954634c0727a32b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]With so much energy collected,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we can
really expand the radar's search area!
InGame.InGame_CollectPodKira_Area010:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6b535171f1474a81abc9b1bbdeb9369f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You two are naturals at this exploration
stuff, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6b535171f1474a81abc9b1bbdeb9369f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]You've collected so much energy, I think
we can fully restore the S.S. Shepherd!
InGame.InGame_CollectPodKira_Area004:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="41023cc471964048913ac8ff85765ce7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I believe this should do it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="41023cc471964048913ac8ff85765ce7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]If I boost our radar to its maximum range,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
we'll find every Koppaite on this planet!
InGame.InGame_CollectPodKira_Area006:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1d416f07dd444e888a0f1e586a27c8c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What a wonderful dilemma... [etc:Wait frame="15"/]How would we
use all this energy you collected?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1d416f07dd444e888a0f1e586a27c8c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Can we truly strengthen our radar even

of Koppai's science can accomplish!

still hasn't reached its maximum capacity.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="afc69d6da3a3484fa12b222e0a52b635" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Intriguing...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The sparklium doesn't seem to
possess any weight or volume.
InGame.InGame_CollectPodKira_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1704c20971034477b4a7ea8d6576a62d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You know what that means?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] No matter
how much energy we collect,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our tank
should be able to handle it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1704c20971034477b4a7ea8d6576a62d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]You've done a great job collecting treasure
so far.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] No reason to stop now.
InGame.InGame_Discovery_Pongashi_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9023eeecff5e4a63a4fb9d23000e5bc1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I can't believe a flower that big is blooming
underground...
InGame.InGame_Discovery_Pongashi_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a34441892fb24ff2b3cc573a46d38de8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I believe it's called a "[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Candypop Bud[System:Color name="Default"]."[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a34441892fb24ff2b3cc573a46d38de8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]When you throw a Pikmin into it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they're
transformed into a Pikmin that matches
the color of the flower.
InGame.InGame_Discovery_Pongashi_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3883da192d804281ae3f60eeb61f4538" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Unbelievable.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They can even change color?[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Pikmin are the strangest creatures.
InGame.InGame_Drone_PinDelete_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ba72c0504a2f40a5b083f1784c75bf0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Nice try,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but you can only place up to
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]3[System:Color name="Default"] pins at a time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Delete any pins you
aren't using with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ba72c0504a2f40a5b083f1784c75bf0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I cleverly designed this technology so you
can also place or delete pins directly from
the Radar Map.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ba72c0504a2f40a5b083f1784c75bf0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]How will you choose to delete a pin? [etc:Wait frame="15"/]I'm
eager to see which method you prefer.
InGame.InGame_Drone_PinDelete_MenueBottun: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="17f7db4d8bc448eeb58011ffc3d9dad4" Scale="1"/]Radar Map
InGame.InGame_Drone_PinDelete_CancelBottun: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4597620937724b48a35320449e48fba0" Scale="1"/]Survey Drone
InGame.InGame_ResultTalk_RescureLeaf_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f3791d61b5504e0fb429827a4a00f0e2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]They have leaves growing out of their
head...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So odd.
InGame.InGame_ResultTalk_RescureLeaf_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="be010fa0003a4ed0939f76bbe3ad9f77" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]There is poisonous oxygen in this planet's
atmosphere.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] They shouldn't be able to
survive without their helmet.
InGame.InGame_ResultTalk_RescureLeaf_P02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d3461a64357b480596b919199ee0375f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Something very strange is going on here.
InGame.InGame_ResultTalk_Medicine_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="93e8000fcc9d48c68d0ad651b07b5fc0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]What a fruitful harvest![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="93e8000fcc9d48c68d0ad651b07b5fc0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]From one glow sap I can make exactly
one cure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
InGame.InGame_GetItem_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5a9b6d5a068e4d8cbe740a8365a73f98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="NoMotionTalk" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this seems like an opportune time to
teach you how to use items.
InGame.InGame_GetItem_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e0ffb1445564419380cc7f4ce2603d07" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]From [PictureFont:IconData key="YMenu" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/]Actions,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] open your [Grammar:Decap/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pack
[System:Color name="Default"]with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Right" scale="0.66"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e0ffb1445564419380cc7f4ce2603d07" Scale="1"/]You'll find all your items in there,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so just
pick the one you want to use!
InGame.InGame_Cave_ExplainEnemyRespawn:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="20d68cdccb104f42b235c50547a290fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I thought we cleared all the
creatures out of this cave.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But now
it's teeming with them yet again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="20d68cdccb104f42b235c50547a290fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]They must have found all this open
territory and moved right in...
InGame.InGame_Cave_ExplainEnemyRespawn_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e82ec49120048a0b192ef096cc3180a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]It just goes to show that even if you
explore [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]100ï¼…[System:Color name="Default"] of a cave,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the natural
world won't be kept at bay for long.
InGame.InGame_Icon_Later_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5fd7749f69534a3583d6b2fe9575411d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I noticed you looking at the Radar Map
just now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why don't I tell you about a
handy little function it has?
InGame.InGame_Icon_Later_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d5eb2b6ce3074c8284ea5ca2be899730" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The system will mark [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]discovered caves [System:Color name="Default"]and
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cleared areas[System:Color name="Default"] with [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Later" scale="0.66"/] or [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Later_Pass" scale="0.66"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d5eb2b6ce3074c8284ea5ca2be899730" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]If you go to that spot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the symbol
disappears.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a very useful way
to keep track of your objectives.
InGame.InGame_HardLockGensei_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="afbb46a32ab34138a446c6b331f4de81" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You'll want to keep a close eye on the
creatures, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]but if they move around a lot,
they can easily escape your line of sight.
InGame.InGame_HardLockGensei_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6195d35681e442d1b22b714c02e5ce75" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="ZR_Button" scale="0.66"/] to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]fix your Auto Target Lock[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
keep your aim focused on one target![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6195d35681e442d1b22b714c02e5ce75" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It makes targeting nimble enemies or
aiming while you're in motion a snap.
InGame.InGame_HardLockGensei_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="65b3610ed0aa42f8afc77238eadb2798" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]When that happens,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's a handy trick
for keeping your sights and aim where you
want them.
InGame.InGame_HardLockGensei_02_Yoko:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="33c862bad4e741eab02858a33d208561" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I have a handy trick for that exact
situation.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Unfortunately,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it won't work
while you're using horizontal controls.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="33c862bad4e741eab02858a33d208561" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'll explain how it works so you'll be ready
to try it out when you get a chance.
InGame.InGame_Cave_OverPikminInCave_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e93c6a9889204401971a29a2bb4a5671" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That seems like...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]a lot of Pikmin.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Is your squad bigger than normal?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e93c6a9889204401971a29a2bb4a5671" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I see![etc:Wait frame="8"/] When you're underground,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
you can have a larger squad because
the wild Pikmin you find will join you!
InGame.InGame_Cave_OverPikminInCave_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d5dfa513b2a8497895b626500d17c30a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Does your squad have more Pikmin
in it than usual?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d5dfa513b2a8497895b626500d17c30a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Interesting.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] When you're underground,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the
number you can have increases relative to
how many Glow Pikmin are born.
InGame.InGame_ColorOver_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="99fae042424e43599865768e07d4fe67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why can't these Pikmin come out?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="99fae042424e43599865768e07d4fe67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Ah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] According to the Voyage Log,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]only 3
types of Pikmin [System:Color name="Default"]can be out on the surface
at any given time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="99fae042424e43599865768e07d4fe67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]They really have developed a lot of
protective traits to keep their species
from getting totally wiped out.
InGame.InGame_Cave_OverPikmin_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="969cbd35ad9448c581a39b91c5f93fd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What's the problem?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I see.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The Pikmin
won't follow you onto the surface.
InGame.InGame_Cave_OverPikmin_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c09f18b1b2074d22bb4231fd59e02409" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Yeah, there are limits to how many and
what types of Pikmin you can have out on
the surface at any one time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c09f18b1b2074d22bb4231fd59e02409" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]But don't worry about the rest when you
choose which Pikmin to take![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c09f18b1b2074d22bb4231fd59e02409" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Any remaining Pikmin will go back to the
Onion with the S.S. Beagle.
InGame.InGame_Result_OtakaraComplete_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c2b55861450f4802beeddab8be4922f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Oho?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What is this star-shaped medal?
InGame.InGame_Result_OtakaraComplete_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5bcfb174c5c245669088130a65664101" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] tinkered with the appraisal AI.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now
you'll be able to see when you've collected
all the treasures in a series.
InGame.InGame_Result_OtakaraComplete_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="da19c1ebf13444b48c01ba87b2088e6a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's a resonance in the wave
patterns for treasures of the same type
that lets us [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]extract even more sparklium[System:Color name="Default"].
InGame.InGame_Result_OtakaraComplete_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1a7e5c183d4247b3b78bbc0eb92a8d9a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Can't say that I get the science behind it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but it sounds like we should try to collect
complete series.
InGame.InGame_Area001_DiscoveryMadoriRuins_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ad3845a99296407d935255d3a2bba349" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Look![etc:Wait frame="8"/] There's a cave here too!
InGame.InGame_Area001_DiscoveryMadoriRuins_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5c7df9b3f6cb4fc6b3159d35ae09ca3b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]This area is crawling with creatures.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Our
Rescue Officers could have retreated into
the cave to get away from them.
InGame.InGame_Area001_DiscoveryMadoriRuins_P02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c56c63f426e24cb9a153374992bf3d33" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] we should probably take a look inside.
InGame.InGame_Change_ActiveMission_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="70b175d77d454e04b3f8e3872fcf4d6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh, I see you've used a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]pin[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="70b175d77d454e04b3f8e3872fcf4d6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]So then, I guess I don't need to tell you
that it's as easy as selecting a mission
and pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] to pin it and unpin it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="70b175d77d454e04b3f8e3872fcf4d6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I commend your instincts![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Pinning a
mission is a great way to keep track of
your objectives and progress!
InGame.InGame_CollectPod_SurvivorLeaf_DDB_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d589d1c64273451faf7e43b9e5b94f3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Who or what could this leafy creature be?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d589d1c64273451faf7e43b9e5b94f3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I can only hope it's one of our missing
Rescue Officers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Check their ID!
InGame.InGame_CollectPod_SurvivorLeaf_DDB_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="39c62d4ba57a49749d58dc75339dacbf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What's this?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "Unable to read data"?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] They
should have biometric authentication, but...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="39c62d4ba57a49749d58dc75339dacbf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]This is definitely an issue.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How are we
supposed to find out who this is?
